channel.title: Personal on the void
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on the void

item.title: Can't Sleep, Can't Connect
item.description: I’ve tried everything to fall asleep. Magnesium, breathing exercises, sleeping gummies, ashwagandha, even fever meds. Nothing works. My brain won’t shut the fuck up, racing through thoughts I can’t even remember because they’re so cluttered and chaotic. I focus on my breathing, imagine peaceful places, count backwards from 100. I tire myself out at the gym. None of it changes anything. I barely sleep, then drag myself to the office. Rinse and repeat.
